application.label: Launch on startup
application.desc: Enable or disable if Drop Farmer should be started when your PC has finished booting.

application.label: Show main window on launch
application.desc: If the main window should be shown when Drop Farmer starts.

application.label: Show farm windows automatically for login
application.desc: If enabled, the window of a farm, where login is required to continue, will automatically be shown.

application.label: Prefer reduced motion
application.desc: Enable this setting to keep animations & transitions to the minimum.

application.label: Low resolution streams
application.desc: Enable this setting to automatically set the lowest resolution possible on all streams.
